name: Gun Fight School Project
description:
controls are WASD for the outlaw on left 

controls for sheriff are Numb8 for up numb 4 for left numb6 for right numb5 for down

Outlaw character left  Sheriff on right

Shoot for Outlaw is Space bar

Shoot for Sheriff is Numb 2

semi controller support lug controller in pc and it should work sets to P1 and you need 2 of em for p2 or 1 controller and Numb Pad if you wish to play together on 1 controller!
